text:
A police constable attempted suicide at his house in T.P. Chatiram, allegedly due to some personal problem, on Tuesday night.

According to police, Suresh, attached to the Vilivakkam police station, was on medical leave. On Tuesday, his wife found him hanging from the ceiling of his house. He was rushed to a private hospital in Anna Nagar.

Sneha’s suicide prevention helpline can be reached at 2464 0050/60.
title: Police constable attempts suicide
